summary: Activities should be interrupted when they are paused to prevent unnecessary heartbeating. This follows the pattern described in temporalio/features#602.
userImpact: Paused activities continue heartbeating unnecessarily, wasting resources and potentially causing confusion in activity lifecycle management.
rootCause: Activity heartbeat mechanism does not respect the paused state of an activity.
resolutionDetails: Activity interruption was implemented to handle paused state properly.
keyQuote: Heartbeating activities should be interrupted when the activities are paused.
